phrases: Redraw?
After what Eiji said about the name, we cannot make it into a manuscript.
Hey, what is he mean?
I told you we went to the editorial department yesterday about the whole KOOGY thing, right?
Yeah.
After that, we got together with all the members in the Golden Future Cup and showed each other our names.
And then at the end, Eiji said,
I know which is 3rd, but it is a tie for 1st.
What is that about?
Were not you guys just having a fun little informal get-together?
That Eiji guy is a little strange.
More than a little.
But he is a genius!
And he was giving his flat out opinion as a genius.
We cannot just ignore that.
Our goal is serialization.
We cannot mess up here!
Is there really time to write it again?
You guys have barely slept since you started working on it, right?
Your bodies are going to break down.
Thank you Miyoshi, but no.
If we stop now, we will definitely end up regretting it.
There are no problems with the story.
The drawings are what need fixing.
I need to get them to make better use of Shuujin's story.
Okay, but I have one condition.
Condition?
Yeah.
Let me touch up the story too!
Eh?
There is no need to!
That is just from your perspective as the artist.
After looking at the runner-up king of the Story King's name,
I have been thinking I need to try to aim higher.
Hang on a minute, I will write down my ideas in note form.
I am not sure if the stuff is good enough to get serialized,
but we do not have the luxury of holding back here.
Yeah!
You guys sure are idiots.
Yeah, we are still at the dreaming idiot right now.
What is that?
What is this crap about a tie for 1st?
I have got to make it even more intense, more overwhelming!
The kind of shounen manga that nobody reading it could have any complaints about!
Geez... he is redrawing his name for the Golden Future Cup.
I am in charge of the artwork, so I need to accept the name Aoki-san gives me to make our final work.
She asked me to wait for her to finish the under-sketch on our way home yesterday,
and it is Aoki-san's name, too...
So that means all I can do is try to improve the quality of the final artwork.
Yes!
Crow!
I will...
definitely...
win the Golden Future Cup!
That is because it is shounen manga!
KOOGY-san, is your manga manuscript coming along okay?
It is not important how it is going.
It is already complete in my mind.
All that is left is to put it on paper so everyone can see it.
This is your second work after the Tezuka Award, correct?
Do you have confidence that you will win the Golden Future Cup?
Far more than competing with anyone, what is important to me is being able to express my world to others.
After achieving success in things like music, drama, and fashion design,
I thought I would try to start a revolution in the manga world.
So you are saying you are not concerned with winning or losing?
I would not go that far.
The one who gets 1st in the Golden Future Cup gets close to serialization all at once, right?
And that way, I would be able let even more people know about the the KOOGY world.
Everyone, I hope you will support me.
Just as I thought.
I edited the composition of the second half a bit.
I went through your checks as well, Nakai-san.
Yeah, this is good!
It is much easier to read than before!
And it is altogether more interesting!
With the added action scenes, it is more shounen manga-ish.
Now I just need to get the look of your world 100 percent right!
No, if I can express it even better than that, I have no doubt we will win the Golden Future Cup!
Then the two of us will get serialized!
Of course.
Where is Moritaka?
Still sleeping, of course.
He was late yesterday too.
Is that so?
Okay, I am going.
I do not think I will be back until the manuscript is done.
Not until it is done?
How long will that be?
The deadline is August 2nd.
I should have known you would be all about this once summer vacation started.
Make sure to eat properly.
And please make sure not to push yourself too far.
I know, I know.
Bye.
Moritaka.
What is it, Grandpa?
Working until you have done something you are happy with is good,
because it is something you chose yourself.
But do not forget those around you who are giving you their support, okay?
Mm, got it.
I am heading out!
Dad, please do not stir him up too much.
He is still a child.
Kayoko-san, with manga, if you do not draw well, you get left behind.
Dad, have you been sneaking alcohol again?
Ah?
Man, I am stuffed.
Thanks for the meal.
So how is it going?
Think you will make it?
Well, with the ten days we have left,
we have twenty pages.
So it is two pages a day, huh?
Sounds like plenty!
If you split it equally day-by-day, yeah.
Yeah, but we are going to persevere until the deadline.
We want to make a perfect manuscript.
We should be able to make it more interesting!
There are no limits to manga, right?
Yep.
No ceiling to drawings or stories.
Is not that the truth?
I looked over the design for the characters, and I think we have finally got something I am happy with.
I cannot lose either!
I will go over the lines in my head and make them into something that pulls in the readers more!
Let us give it our best right up to the deadline!
Okay, let us get back to work!
We will get the Golden Future Cup, then go on to serialization!
Yeah!
All right!
Now I am totally hyped up too!
If you need anything, just say the word!
I will help out!
Thank you, Miyoshi.
Okay.
Let us do this!
Battle start!
Done!
All right, we finished!
I will go get something to celebrate!
Okay, we are going to head over to hand this in.
Okay, then we will celebrate when you get back!
All right, I am going to call Hattori-san.
Hello, it is Takagi.
Sorry it is so late.
We have got the manuscript done.
Are you okay?
You did not sleep for the last two days.
Neither did you, Shuujin.
Yeah, but I was resting during that time.
It is okay.
There is no way I can fall asleep.
Not until we hand this in.
Once we get serialized, it will probably feel like this every week.
Not looking forward to it?
No way!
We are finally at a point where we are aiming for serialization.
Instead of dreading it, I am getting more and more hyped about it!
By the way Shuujin, you said that when you were talking me into being a mangaka, right?
You said you wanted to achieve greatness and to get rich.
Well, back then you said that you could not become a mangaka,
and that only a small fraction of geniuses could do it.
Otherwise you are just a gambler.
You have got a good memory.
But I was not wrong.
It is certainly been an ordeal,
but every day there are times when I feel like I am really alive.
And if a gambler strikes it big, they get rich in a second!
Huh?
Keep your voice down.
Anyhow, our goal is not money.
Right.
You are doing this for a woman.
Money... women...
Manga?
So they made the protagonist more shounen manga-ish?
Was this brought on by Fukuda-kun and the others?
So you have edited it in a few places?
Sorry, we did not talk to you about it.
We thought we could make it a bit better.
I am not really mad or anything.
Well, I never asked you to check with me.
But anyhow, good job finishing the changes in time.
Yes.
We did it because we want to take 1st in the Golden Future Cup no matter what.
Mm.
Futatsu no Chikyuu.
Ichi Oku Bun no.
Kono Yo wa Kane to Chie.
Angel Days.
And this work.
There is no doubt in my mind that you two have grown.
You have done well!
Yes, sir!
Thank you very much!
Ashirogi Muto, Gitantei TRAP!
I hereby accept it!
Thank you very much!
A high school student with a short sword?
These days, not even the yakuza whip those out that simply.
And I still got all cut up...
Kiyoshi, that bleeding's serious!
You are in danger!
It is okay if it is just bleeding.
But if my guts came out, that would be lame.
That would be a gutsy kind of lame.
This is not the time to be joking around.
You will die!
even if I die, as long as I saved Shouko, I am fine with it.
I do not mind dying for Shouko's sake!
You idiot!
If you died, then who do you think would be the one who would mourn you the most, Kiyoshi?
Uh...
My mom?
Kiyoshi!
I do not know if you are lying or not, but it would obviously be Shouko-chan.
She did not give me any chocolate for Valentines...
Do not speak anymore!
No matter how many thousands of sit ups I do every day,
it is all pointless if I can get stabbed so easily and end up like this.
How is it?
It is gotten more interesting since the name we read.
He used a calligraphy pen for the artwork and a lot of slanted lines...
to give it more intensity than the one-shot version.
Can we win against this?
We have to.
The early report for this comes out tomorrow, then the real deal on Friday.
The results come out that fast?
Well, it is a week.
I wonder if Hattori-san'll tell us the results.
He probably will if we ask,
but I doubt he will go out of his way to tell us.
When our results come out, he might tell us if we did better than Fukuda-san.
So you are saying that if he does not tell us anything, it means ours was worse?
Let us just not ask about what results other works are getting.
We will just concentrate on making our serialization name.
Mm, got it.
Ah, but I am so worried about it...
I want to be number one...
Oh man, tomorrow's the early report, eh?
Niizuma-sensei, mine was interesting, right?
KIYOSHI is cool!
It was interesting.
And the artwork noticeably improved.
The early report for KIYOSHI Knight...
Please!
All right!
Aw man, if Fukuda Shinta follows right after Niizuma Eiji, gets serialized,
and becomes a hit, then I will be a prime choice to be the next captain!
No, I cannot relax yet.
Who knows what will happen in the real deal.
Or what the other three works will get...
Especially Ashirogi Muto.
And Makaino Kouji with totally unpredictable votes...
KOOGY-san, the Monday after next is the deadline.
You understand that, do not you?
I know, I am just collecting data.
I cannot help it if it is a little late, right?
Jump!
Times three!
Times three more!
It is here!
Real deal!
Hello?
Yes.
Just as I expected!
So is it okay for me to start on serialization names for KIYOSHI Knight?
Oh, so you did it!
Congratulations!
You will submit them for the serialization meeting, right?
AAoki-san...
Fukuda-kun just got a call from his editor.
It sounds like the results for the real deal were really good.
I see.
Is that the only matter of importance?
YYes.
I have no real interest in the results of others.
Excuse me.
Shit!
The one who proposed the trade for the painting...
I stole for the surveillance camera video they were going to use as proof against me...
And that me in the video, too...
It was you?!
I do not know who that person is,
but the fact that you are the one carrying that stolen painting is unshakable proof!
If there is no proof, you just need to make it!
The painting our artist father protected so dearly...
Thank you so much.
And about your 10,000 dollar fee...
I just received it.
Eh?
Saori-san, your smile is worth more than 10,000 dollars.
Is not this awesome?
Our work is running in Weekly Shounen Jack!
TRAP is so interesting!
You will be all right!
You will win over Kiyoshiko no Yoru.
Kiyoshi no Yoru = Kiyoshi Night
It is not Kiyoshiko no Yoru, it is Knight.
Saikou, what is with the glum face?
When I see my own drawings running in Jack like this, it makes me realize how bad they really are.
Not only were ONE PIECE and NARUTO well done from their first chapter onward, they were individualistic.
Do not you think Oda-sensei's and Kishimoto-sensei's drawings are unique?
Well, you are certainly right about that, but there are so many people to compare to...
That is got to be Miho.
I told her that it was going on sale today.
So it is Azuki?
Did she write any impressions she had?
She said TRAP was interesting!
I suddenly feel really confident.
We are definitely getting 1st!
Same guy as always.
Mm, this is interesting.
The story and drawings are way powered up from when it was a name.
That is Ashirogi-sensei for you.
Their stories are amazing and they have got drawings to match them.
Between theirs and mine, which is more interesting?
Hmm... it is a tie.
So by that do you mean...
So back then... it was between Fukuda-kun and Mashiro-kun's works?
If that is true...
Did you see the early report?
Yeah.
This Golden Future Cup's turning out to be a pretty interesting one.
How is the one you are editor for, Aida-san?
I am sure mine's amazing too.
I am psyched for the third week.
Hello, Takagi-kun?
It is Hattori.
I understand.
Yes.
Thank you very much.
It is still just the early report,
but he said to go ahead and make the complete serialization names for TRAP!
All right!
Thank you very much.
I will take the manuscript and go.
Yeah, thanks.
KOOGY-san, did you read KIYOSHI Knight or Gitantei TRAP?
I already know I will win by a mile, so there is no need to read them.
Well then, excuse me.
I will be looking forward to hearing about the questionnaire results.
The real deal for TRAP...
Please!
No... but... this means...
Let me see the results from last issue...
Quick cigarette break!
Really?
Thank you so much!
It did not change for the real deal!
Yay!
So did he say who was higher between us and KIYOSHI Knight?
Uh, he did not say that specifically.
But he said to write the serialization names, so...
About the same?
How much is about?
Give
Me a straight answer!
About the same...
That means Ashirogi-kun's results were good too?
AA fairy?
II cannot believe in something like that.
You opened that door and came in yourself, and still you cannot believe?
You have one of two choices.
Gain a fairy's soul and become our comrade, or be left out as food.
Eh?!
WhWhat is this?
It is amazing...
He drew the background and stuff with stippling.
Those are really pretty drawings.
Nakai-san...
He said he was betting his life as a mangaka on this,
but to go this far...
This will get votes just based on the drawings.
Mm.
I like this too.
This could be bad for us.
But even if it is Nakai-san, there is no way he can keep this up on a weekly basis, right?
You are right!
It is a weekly magazine, is not it?
No, Nakai-san's speed and technique are nothing to make light of.
And if he gets assistants to help him, I think it would be possible.
Beautiful!
Nakai-san, it is amazing!
It is fantastic!
Oh, no, I...
What is with this drawing quality?
I was underestimating Nakai-san too much!
And that woman...
Her story's as candy-house-errific as ever,
but in a few places she made it more like a shounen manga.
No, mine's definitely more of a shounen manga.
This too.
I cannot believe even this one is...
Okay, why do not I go give Nakai a call?
RReally?!
Yeah, with these early report results, you are all right.
I did it...
Now I can work together with Aoki-san...
Are you listening, Nakai-kun?
YYYes!
Thank you very much!
Congratulations, Nakai-san!
Congratulations.
Good job.
The way he is celebrating...
No way...
Could I have lost?
I see.
So in terms of ranking, it went down.
Do not worry.
The approval rating's basically the same.
As it is, you should go on ahead.
I understand.
Excuse me.
Okay.
Do not get so down.
I went down in ranking with the real deal as well.
Even your editor said you can go ahead and move towards getting serialized.
So you are the same as me there too.
The next battle will be at the serialization meeting.
I am not down...
I am kind of relieved and happy.
I am happy because I was able to fight on par with you and Ashirogi-kun.
Thank you, Niizuma-sensei, Fukuda-kun...
This is thanks to you guys.
Cut it out, Nakai-san.
Cry after you have gotten serialized.
And do not forget, we have still got KOOGY's work to contend with.
YYou're right.
We can definitely win against this.
I totally cannot tell what is going on.
It is kind of like he is so infatuated with himself that he cannot communicate it to us.
Oh, you understand it pretty well then, Miyoshi.
But I wonder how much he got his fans to move.
That KOOGY is making fun of manga!
Even if his fans do vote for it, if the editorial department serializes something like this, I will withdraw from Jack!
Fukuda-sensei, you are so cool!
If that happens, I will quit my series too!
No, sensei, you do not need to go that far.
Really?
Is that so?
These are the results for the real deal.
Every work in the Golden Future Cup was amazing!
It is okay.
Azuki-san?
I believe that your work was the best, Mashiro-kun.
Next time, Phone and Last Night.
We will seize our dream.
We have to believe in ourselves!
